alert.note: Alert for Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:21PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Porter County through 500 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Valparaiso, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valparaiso and Malden. This includes...Porter County Fairgrounds and Valparaiso University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
